data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 Version 1803 (OS Build 17134.48) & iPhone 5s, iOS 10.0.1
data.actual_result: The connections are sorted in some other kind of order. The only difference is when the Xbox Live connection came to Desktop
data.expected_result: The connections are sorted in alphabetical order, like Android and iOS 11
data.short_description: Connections under the Connections tab in settings on iOS 10 (and lower) and Desktop are not sorted after alphabetical order
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Go to Connections - Observe the possible connections under Connect your account (iOS 10 is under Add)
